roleset.name: offering no benefit
roleset.note: USELESS-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. Close relation to use.01, but extends slightly beyond the boundaries of the verb's arg1. Relation to 'useful'. (from useless.01-j)

role.descr: purpose for which arg1 is useless

example.name: arg1
example.text: If they know it 's useless to put themselves first , maybe they wo n't .
